Variables: Count of Active Fire Points within each of the following radial buffers (25 km, 50 km, 100 km, and 500 km) for same day and up to 7 lag days for each radial buffer
Source: MODIS Thermal Anomalies/Fire Daily L3 Global 1km product

Variables: Binary Fire indicator (0 for no active fire points in any buffer radii or lag for given point; 1 otherwise)
Source: MODIS Thermal Anomalies/Fire Daily L3 Global 1km product

Variables: Summed length (in meters) of arterial (A) and collector (C) roads and both (A + C) within 100, 250, 500, and 1000 m buffer radii

Source: MODIS Terra and Aqua combined Multi-angle Implementation of Atmospheric Correction (MAIAC) dataset

Variables: dew point temperature at 2m above ground (degrees Celsius)

Source: **are we using this as a predictor variable???

Variables: % of urban development within each of the following radial buffers (1 km, 5 km, and 10 km)
